name: HYPER GOLD \ VECTOR
description:
You pilot the VECTOR. 

Shoot enemies. Mine gold. Buy Upgrade. Die. Repeat.

- - - = = = - - - 

OPERATOR_INSTRUCTIONS_

WASD to MOVE_

SHIFT to WARP_

Left Click to SHOOT_

Right Click to Mine_

- - - = = = - - - 

Jam Version!

Special thanks to 

Ilan, Justin, and Tristan for playtesting!
